name: SkeleGirl Versus the Machine Uprising
description:
SOUND WARNING - you might want to turn down your audio a bit before playing!

_Instructions_

Use the enemies bullets to your advantage, while you're unable to shoot, you can use you shield and dodge to reflect bullets. Use your dodge to grab bullets and throw them back at enemies using left click. Block with right click, and if timed properly you'll get a parry which lets you redirect a more powerful bullet.

WASD - Movement

Space - Dodge (Dodge through bullets to grab them)

Left Click - Throw ( Throw grabbed bullets)

Hold Right Click - Reflector (Time it well to parry bullets)

KNOWN BUG:

Sometimes a successful parry will cause time to slow forever, in this case, restart the game by reloading the page.

_Credits_

Programmers - Abdul Fallah, Marcus Kuffner

Artist / Programmer - Kidane Gabay

Music Boi - Ryan Liberty

Thanks for playing!!!
